cause.description:
WCG's work is built on the belief that technological innovation combined with visionary scientific research and large-scale volunteerism can change our world for the better. Success depends on individuals collectively contributing their unused computer time to this not-for-profit endeavor.
Donate the time your computer is turned on, but is idle, to projects that benefit humanity! WCG provides the secure software that does it all for free, and you become part of a community that is helping to change the world. Once you install the software, you will be participating in World Community Grid. No other action must be taken; it's that simple! To learn more and join, please visit the website below.
http://www.worldcommunitygrid.org/
1. You can help change the world.
2. Join World Community Grid today to contribute to projects that benefit humanity!
cause.mission: To create the largest public computing grid benefiting humanity.
cause.name: World Community Grid
